that makes two of us.translation[0].defi: used to say that you agree with someone or that something that is true of them is true of you too
‘I haven’t a clue what’s going on.’ ‘That makes two of us.’
that makes two of us.translation[1].defi: used to tell someone that you are in the same situation and feel the same way
‘But I don’t know anything about children!’ ‘Well, that makes two of us.’
